programme.desc: The No. 7 Fighting Irish host the No. 10 Hoosiers for a College Football Playoff first-round game. The winner meets Georgia in the quarterfinals at the Sugar Bowl on New Year's Day. The Indiana schools, located some 200 miles apart, last met in 1991.

programme.title: College Football
programme.sub-title: CFP First Round: SMU at Penn State
programme.desc: No. 6 Penn State faces No. 11 SMU in a CFP first-round matchup. The schools met twice before, a 13-13 tie in the 1947 Cotton Bowl and a Penn State home victory in 1978. The winner faces No. 3 Boise State in the quarterfinals on New Year's Eve.

programme.sub-title: CFP First Round: Clemson at Texas

programme.desc: The No. 9 Volunteers (10-2) draw the No. 8 Buckeyes (10-2) in the College Football Playoff's first round. Ohio State went 3-4 during the four-team era of the CFP, winning a national title in 2014-15. Tennessee beat OSU in the 1995-96 Citrus Bowl.

programme.desc: Spanish-American War deserters (Mario Van Peebles, Stephen Baldwin, Charles Lane) wind up defending a black township from a sheriff and his henchmen.

programme.title: When You Clean a Stranger's Home

programme.title: Lemon
programme.desc: After Isaac's blind girlfriend walks out on him, his life goes into free fall, and he directs an unhinged staging of Chekhov's "The Seagull," attends the Passover Seder from hell, and attempts to woo a new flame.

programme.title: Lemon

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) gets ensnared in a deadly, global adventure when she becomes the reluctant partner of a fugitive spy (Tom Cruise).

programme.title: Trap

programme.title: Vampires Suck

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he must prevent a terrible future only he can foresee.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: Stand Up & Shout: Songs From a Philly High School
programme.desc: Students at Philadelphia's Hill-Freedman World Academy work with local musicians to create an album of powerful, original songs that captures both the challenging times they're living in and the joy that music brings.

programme.title: She's Out of My League
programme.desc: An airport security agent (Jay Baruchel) must figure out how to make the relationship work when a beautiful, successful woman (Alice Eve) falls in love with him.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: Bob the Drag Queen, Eureka O'Hara and Shangela Laquifa Wadley arrive in Gettysburg, Pa., to put on a one-night-only drag show featuring locals in need of a little support and empowerment, including Hunter, Darryl and Erica.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: Bob, Eureka and Shangela head to Twin Falls, Idaho, a conservative, predominantly Mormon community in Magic Valley; the queens meet a group of drag artists who need help forming a community and work with Clifton, Brandon and Mikayla.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: In Branson, Mo., a wholesome showbiz town smack in the middle of the Bible Belt, Bob, Eureka, and Shangela help Tanner, Charles and Chris who are struggling to be their true selves in a community that prides itself on its traditional values.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: The queens help the residents of Farmington and Shiprock, N.M.; they enlist gay Navajo photographer Nate, lesbian public defender Nicole, and Stacey and her daughter, Jasmine, who are processing the suicide of their daughter and sister, DJ.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: Bob, Eureka and Shangela shake things up in Ruston, La.; they enlist Jose, a gay man who is tired of censoring himself, ex-firefighter Stacy, a straight ally, and Lynn, a lesbian who lost her left arm and leg but wants to reclaim her independence.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: COVID-19 disrupts the queens' production schedule, but they make it work; as Bob, Eureka and Shangela explore the series' impact, they reveal the life-changing experiences they've had traveling across the country and meeting LGBTQ community members.

programme.title: House at the End of the Street
programme.desc: A divorcee (Elisabeth Shue) and her daughter (Jennifer Lawrence) learn that they have moved next door to a house in which a girl killed her parents, then disappeared, leaving a brother (Max Thieriot) as the only survivor.

programme.title: Candyman 3: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: A woman (Donna D'Errico) tries to disprove a legend that her ancestor (Tony Todd) can appear and kill people with his hook.

programme.title: Gone With the Wind
programme.desc: Presented as originally released in 1939. Includes themes and character depictions which may be offensive and problematic to contemporary audiences. A Southern belle struggles to return her family's estate to its original glory after the Civil War.

programme.title: Civil War

programme.title: We're Here

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: Bob, Eureka, and Shangela work with James, an often-misgendered trans man navigating neurodiversity; Jake, his faith influencer mom Michelle, and his partner Brad; and Andrei, a cheerleader who longs for his mother's acceptance.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: Bob, Eureka, and Shangela to visit the border town of Del Rio, Texas during Pride Month; the queens celebrate gay-identifying mayor Bruno Lozano's positive impact on the community, Joey's identity quest, and Esael's coming out journey.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: Bob, Eureka, and Shangela help recently-transitioned Akeelah find the confidence to live life beyond closed doors, release Joseph's deep-seated pain, and encourage Deborah to prioritize herself for a change.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: Bob, Eureka, and Shangela help Methodist Pastor Craig promote LGBTQ equality to his congregants, inspire Tunisian refugee Kaïs to celebrate all facets of his identity, and facilitate the wedding of civil rights activists Barbara and Yvon.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: The queens mentor competitive identical twins, a fierce mamabear and a LGBTQ ally.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: A former drag queen gets his heels back; a teacher learns to embrace her bisexuality; a Mahu warrior is inspired to be more vulnerable.

programme.title: We're Here
programme.desc: The queens empower three trans members of Grand Junction, Colorado's queer community to unleash their best selves.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: La historia real del capitán Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger, un piloto que se convirtió en un héroe al realizar un amerizaje de emergencia en el río Hudson en su desembocadura en la ciudad de Nueva York el 15 de enero de 2009, salvando muchas vidas.

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Paul Atreides se une a Chani y a los Fremen mientras busca venganza contra los conspiradores que destruyeron a su familia. Paul se enfrenta a una elección entre el amor de su vida y el destino del universo, y debe evitar un futuro terrible.

programme.desc: Una ama de casa aburrida se obsesiona con los anuncios de alguien que busca desesperadamente a Susan. Pero ella está metida en grandes problemas y las cosas realmente se complican cuando la ama de casa es confundida con la fugitiva.

programme.title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past

programme.desc: Billi, una mujer chino-estadounidense, regresa a su país natal cuando se entera de que su abuela padece un cáncer terminal. Allí, descubre que su familia ha engañado a la abuela con una falsa boda que les dé la excusa para despedirse de ella.

programme.title: Showing Up
programme.desc: Un escultor que se prepara para inaugurar una nueva exposición intenta trabajar en medio de los dramas diarios de familiares y amigos.

programme.desc: Un muchacho de 15 años pide ayuda a sus dos mejores amigos para recuperar sus zapatillas Air Jordan, que fueron robadas por un matón del vecindario.

programme.title: Captain Fantastic
programme.desc: Ben y su esposa Leslie llevan años criando a sus seis hijos en los bosques del estado de Washington. Cuando ella muere, Ben decide llevarlos de vuelta a la civilización, pero el contraste entre estos dos mundos resulta muy duro para todos ellos.

programme.title: Disobedience
programme.desc: Ronit, una fotógrafa, regresa a Londres con motivo de la muerte de su padre, un rabino. Al volver se reencuentra con una amiga por la que siente atracción, pero el lesbianismo no está bien visto en la comunidad ortodoxa judía a la que pertenecen.

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In 1823, fur trapper Hugh Glass (Leonardo DiCaprio) treks through the snowy wilderness to track down John Fitzgerald (Tom Hardy), a member of his hunting team who killed his young son (Forrest Goodluck) and left him for dead.

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Under the guidance of Syracuse University football coach Ben Schwartzwalder, Ernie Davis overcomes poverty and prejudice to become the first black man to win the Heisman Trophy.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Torn apart from her sister and her children, Celie faces many hardships, including an abusive husband. With support from a singer and her stepdaughter, she ultimately finds extraordinary strength in the unbreakable bonds of a new kind of sisterhood.

programme.title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
programme.desc: When his boss (John Tormey) turns against him, a hit man (Forest Whitaker) who lives like a samurai must fend for his life.

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: A teen (Brenton Thwaites) discovers the dark truth about his community's secret past from an old man (Jeff Bridges) who is the sole keeper of their world's memories.

programme.title: High-Rise
programme.desc: A doctor (Tom Hiddleston) moves into a London skyscraper where rising tensions and class warfare lead to anarchy.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Accused of murder, a man (Justin Timberlake) must figure out how to bring down a system where time is money, enabling the wealthy to live forever, while the poor must beg for each minute of life.

programme.desc: With his job at stake, a tech-savvy employee (Liam Hemsworth) has to infiltrate a competitor's company and steal trade secrets for his ruthless boss (Gary Oldman).

programme.desc: With help from trainer Kevin Rooney (Aaron Eckhart), champion boxer Vinny Pazienza (Miles Teller) tries to make a comeback after breaking his neck in a car accident.

programme.title: Homefront
programme.desc: A former DEA agent (Jason Statham) returns to action to save his daughter and his new town from a drug-dealing sociopath (James Franco).

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: A high school student exploring her independence on homecoming night is disrupted by her older brother and the shadows of their past.

programme.title: Time Bandits
programme.desc: Cosmic dwarfs take a boy on an odyssey featuring Robin Hood (John Cleese), Napoleon, King Agamemnon (Sean Connery).

programme.desc: Named Emperor of China at age 3 in 1908, Pu Yi (John Lone) becomes a prisoner of destiny.

programme.title: Dim Sum Funeral
programme.desc: The grown children of an overbearing Chinese matriarch reluctantly gather to take part in seven days' worth of traditional funeral rites.

programme.title: Last Christmas
programme.desc: Nothing seems to go right for young Kate, a frustrated Londoner who works as an elf in a year-round Christmas shop. But things soon take a turn for the better when she develops a growing attraction to a charming suitor who seems too good to be true.

programme.desc: A man's journey through New York City takes on a hallucinatory quality as he floats through alternate lives he could have lived, while his daughter wrestles with her own path as she considers her future.

programme.desc: A Greek stonemason named Theseus (Henry Cavill) revolts against a bloodthirsty king who wants to throw the gods out of Olympus and become master of the world.

programme.desc: After a mysterious apocalypse leaves the world with few survivors, two families are forced to share a home in an uneasy alliance to keep the outside evil at bay -- only to learn that the true horror may come from within.

programme.title: The Monster
programme.desc: Left stranded after their car breaks down, a woman (Zoe Kazan) and her daughter (Ella Ballentine) must fight for survival when a terrifying monster attacks them on a deserted road near the woods.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: As sorority sisters prepare for holiday parties, a mysterious cloaked figure starts to leave a bloody trail throughout their campus. Refusing to become victims, the girls decide to band together and fight back against the psychotic Christmas killer.
